author: manoj
msg: Allow BeOS to use its native closesocket() call

author: stoddard
msg: 1. Register a cleanup for the socket (missed the call to ap_note_cleanup... in previous version)
2. Signal the parent to die on error. This will prevent the parent from attempting to restart the child.
Both of these fixes are already in the Apache 2.0 winnt mpm.

author: manoj
msg: The closesocket define causes problems on BeOS. Get rid of it where
